author: cmlenz
msg: It seems we need to run the 'unit' tests before the 'sample' tests, because otherwise JBoss/Jetty will fail with what seems to be a mixed up response:
The TestJspTagLifecycle.testOutTagDefaultBody() gets the response from the test in TestSampleBodyTag. Very,very[, very]* weird.

author: cmlenz
msg: In the SetContentType test, add some XML content to the response.
Otherwise the test fails on Orion (1.6.0b and 2.0.1), because for some reason the content-type is reset to text/html.

author: cmlenz
msg: Use setter instead of constructor argument to specify the Log, default to the NULL_LOG
